results.content:
The course is not enough to learn Node.JS Selenium Webdriver as the name suggest. Everything was told like reading a book. 

Please don't pay for it. May be I should ask for a refund.

results.content:
Pues ciertamente dan las bases para aprender, pero definitivamente querrás más.
Es un buen curso por el precio pero hay muchos más tópicos en los que profundizar como los doble click y la selección de iframes, entre otras cosas.

Recomendable para adentrarse en el mundo de las automatizaciones de pruebas.

results.content:
I think I might request a refund. How can this guy sell his half-hour course for the same price as guys who make 50 hour courses? 

This will not explain anything in detail it's just the guy running through an example without covering any tricky parts of automating a website. How do you handle a list of elements that all have the same class and click them all? How do you handle dropdowns in detail? what about navigating mulitple pages and filling out information that has to be validated? NOTHING. He just speed runs through a website using only the most basic functionality webdriver for node js offers. 

T0 boot he hasn't answered ANY questions in the QA section. Literally just trying to make a quick buck.

I was super excited about this course beause there are none for beginners that cover WebdriverJS but after taking it I'm pretty mad.

results.content: Very basic, not many topics covered. Example how to troubleshoot any issues of an element not found or issues with focus etc. Not worth spending money.
results.content_html: Very basic, not many topics covered. Example how to troubleshoot any issues of an element not found or issues with focus etc. Not worth spending money.

results.content: While this course was way too fast, it was very straight forward. However,  he didn't explain a lot of the code. The jasmine and promises topics were very confusing and I ended up doing a lot of research on my own.
results.content_html: While this course was way too fast, it was very straight forward. However, he didn't explain a lot of the code. The jasmine and promises topics were very confusing and I ended up doing a lot of research on my own.

results.content: Excellent Course!  I've worked with Selenium in Java, but need to work in Node.js and mocha.  This course provides the information I need to get started, and was the perfect length.
results.content_html: Excellent Course! I've worked with Selenium in Java, but need to work in Node.js and mocha. This course provides the information I need to get started, and was the perfect length.

results.content: Too fast. Also, code presented is out-of-date. Node.js is now forcing developers to use async code. As a result, the examples shown do not work until "catch()" statements are added.
results.content_html: Too fast. Also, code presented is out-of-date. Node.js is now forcing developers to use async code. As a result, the examples shown do not work until "catch()" statements are added.

results.content:

After this course you will be able to drill down to selenium-webdriver module site by yourself.
